emr_vis_nlp.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.controller.MainController

  • public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Fulfills the Controller role of the MVC design pattern. Responsible for all communication and coordination among the backing MainModel and the front-end MainView. Is tasked with querying the back-end model and building many of the intermediate data structures (ie, TableModels) required by front-end components, and monitoring and updating these intermediate structures as necessary.

    • Method Detail

      • getMainController

        public static MainController getMainController()
        Factory method for generating a singleton MainController.
        Returns:
        the governing controller object for the visualization, or a new MainController if none exist yet

      • setModel

        public void setModel(MainModel model)
        Associates the controller with a back-end MainModel data source.
        Parameters:
        model - the model with which this controller should be associated.

      • setPredictor

        public void setPredictor(MLPredictor predictor)
        Associates the controller with a back-end NLP prediction module.
        Parameters:
        predictor - nlp / ml module which should be used for predictions

      • setView

        public void setView(MainView view)
        Associates the controller with a front-end MainView to which view events should be pushed.
        Parameters:
        view - the MainView with which this controller is associated.

      • setModelFromDoclist

        public void setModelFromDoclist(java.io.File file)
        Associates the controller with a new back-end MainModel loaded from a doclist file. Refreshes the visualization after loading is complete.
        Parameters:
        file - doclist file pointing the resources required by MainModel.

      • buildSimpleDocTableModel

        public DocTableModel buildSimpleDocTableModel()
        Builds a new backing DocTableModel for a document-based table in the visualization. Bases this table on the currently-loaded MainModel.
        Returns:
        backing DocTableModel, or null if no model is currently loaded.

      • buildSimpleAttrSelectionTableModel

        public AttrTableModel buildSimpleAttrSelectionTableModel()
        Builds a new backing AttrTableModel for an attribute selection table in the visualization. Bases this table on the currently-loaded MainModel.
        Returns:
        backing AttrTableModel, or null if not model is currently loaded.

      • attributeSelectionUpdated

        public void attributeSelectionUpdated(java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> newSelectedAttributes)
        This method is called when the list of selected attributes (for a boolean-selection-based view) is changed. This method is responsible for pushing updates to all relevant views and view-backing intermediate models.
        Parameters:
        newSelectedAttributes - boolean list indicating whether or not each attribute is selected.

      • buildDocTreeMapViewComponent

        public javax.swing.JComponent buildDocTreeMapViewComponent()
        Builds and returns a new DocumentTreeMapView component based on the current back-end model.
        Returns:
        treemap-like interactive visualization for exploring the dataset

      • buildSimpleTreeMapSelectionTableModel

        public TreeMapSelectorTableModel buildSimpleTreeMapSelectionTableModel()
        Builds backing TableModel for a treemap-oriented attribute selection table, based on the attributes in the currently-loaded Model.
        Returns:
        backing model for categorical attribute selection, else null if no model is loaded.

      • buildAttrAndPredictionModelForDoc

        public DocDetailsTableModel buildAttrAndPredictionModelForDoc(int docGlobalId)
        Builds and returns a backing TableModel for presenting a detailed view of the attributes, predictions, certainties, and manually-annotated values associated with a particular document.
        Parameters:
        docGlobalId - index of the target document
        Returns:
        backing TableModel

      • writeDocTextWithHighlights

        public void writeDocTextWithHighlights(javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument abstDoc,
                              int globalDocId,
                              java.lang.String attrName)
        Rebuilds the text content of a given AbstractDocument, populating it with the text of a particular target document. Also highlights and blows-up particular terms of importance to the back-end NLP model for a particular attribute.
        Parameters:
        abstDoc - AbstractDocument to have its text replaced with the target document's highlighted text
        globalDocId - index of the target document
        attrName - name of the attribute for which terms should be highlighted and enlarged

      • writeDocTextWithHighlights

        public void writeDocTextWithHighlights(javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument abstDoc,
                              int globalDocId,
                              int globalAttrId)
        Rebuilds the text content of a given AbstractDocument, populating it with the text of a particular target document. Also highlights and blows-up particular terms of importance to the back-end NLP model for a particular attribute.
        Parameters:
        abstDoc - AbstractDocument to have its text replaced with the target document's highlighted text
        globalDocId - index of the target document
        globalAttrId - index of the target attribute

      • documentAttributesUpdated

        public void documentAttributesUpdated(int docGlobalID)
        Called when attributes for a target document have been updated; is responsible for pushing out updates to relevant views.
        Parameters:
        docGlobalID -

      • buildDocDetailsWindow

        private javax.swing.JFrame buildDocDetailsWindow(int docGlobalID)
        Constructs a new window for presenting a single document in detail, ie, in terms of its text and attribute values. This method should generally only be called by displayDocDetailsWindow, after that method checks for the existence of the details window for the target document.
        Parameters:
        docGlobalID - index of target document
        Returns:
        new top-level container for target doc, or null if there's no mainmodel

      • displayDocDetailsWindow

        public void displayDocDetailsWindow(int docGlobalID)
        Displays a window for presenting a single document in detail, ie, in terms of its text and attribute values. If the target window already exists, attention is brought to the target window. Otherwise, a new window is created.
        Parameters:
        docGlobalID - index of the target document to display

      • removeDocDetailsWindow

        public boolean removeDocDetailsWindow(javax.swing.JFrame popup)
        Removes a target document's details popup from the controller's internal tracking. This should be called whenever the details window is closed.
        Parameters:
        popup - window to be closed
        Returns:
        true if popup was being tracked by controller, false otherwise

      • updateTreeMapAttributes

        public void updateTreeMapAttributes()
        Called when the categorically-selected attributes for the TreeMap view have been changed. Pushes relevant adjustments to the relevant views.

      • buildDocumentGrid

        public DocumentGrid buildDocumentGrid()
        Builds DocumentGrid view from the current backing model.
        Returns:
        DocumentGrid to be loaded into the mainview

      • updateDocumentGrid

        public void updateDocumentGrid()
        similar to buildDocumentGrid(), but rather than rebuilding the grid from scratch, simply updates the attributes by which the grid is laid out based on the appropriate TableModel.

      • buildSimpleDocGridSelectionTableModel

        public DocGridTableSelectorModel buildSimpleDocGridSelectionTableModel()
        Builds and returns a new backing table model for the table used to select attributes for the document grid view.
        Returns:
        backing DocGridTableSelectorModel

      • getVarBarChartForCell

        public VarBarChartForCell getVarBarChartForCell(java.lang.String attrName)
        Builds a VarBarChartForCell display for a given attribute. Returned display is meant to be used as cell in table.
        Parameters:
        attrName - name of target attribute for which display shoudl be created
        Returns:
        varbarchart visualization for target attribute

      • updateDocumentAttr

        public void updateDocumentAttr(int docID,
                      java.lang.String docAttr,
                      java.lang.String docAttrVal)
        Updates the value of a particular attribute for a particular document. NOTE: because this method may be called from multiple threads running in parallel (ie, from separate doc details windows), we should make sure it's synchronized
        Parameters:
        docID -
        docAttr -
        docAttrVal -
